sql: SELECT `books`.`id`, `books`.`authors_id`, `books`.`languages_id`, `books`.`title`, `books`.`year`, `books`.`created_at`, `books`.`updated_at`, `author`.`id` AS `author.id`, `author`.`name` AS `author.name`, `author`.`created_at` AS `author.created_at`, `author`.`updated_at` AS `author.updated_at` FROM `books` AS `books` INNER JOIN `authors` AS `author` ON `books`.`authors_id` = `author`.`id` WHERE (`books`.`id` IN (1, 2, 3) AND `books`.`id` >= 2 AND `books`.`id` < 10) AND `books`.`title` IN ('Alice', 'Bob') LIMIT 1
